name: Github Release
description: Github Release feature will download, extract and add to path a release binary from a given repo

repo.description: Select the version of the github release binary to install.

target.description: The target binary name. For example, for Github CLI the binary name would be 'gh'. For DigitalOcean CLI: 'doctl', etc.

version.description: Select the version of the github release binary to install.
